## Data Processing

[Place Holder Test and R Code Here]

```{r File Processing}
library(dplyr)
download.file('https://d396qusza40orc.cloudfront.net/repdata%2Fdata%2FStormData.csv.bz2','./StormData.csv.bz2')
Raw_StormData <- read.csv("StormData.csv.bz2")
HealthData <- Raw_StormData %>% select(STATE, COUNTYNAME, EVTYPE, FATALITIES, INJURIES)
EconData <- Raw_StormData %>% select(STATE, COUNTYNAME, EVTYPE, PROPDMG, PROPDMGEXP, CROPDMG, CROPDMGEXP)
EconData <- EconData %>% mutate(across(STATE:EVTYPE, as.factor))
 EconData <- EconData %>% mutate(as.factor(PROPDMGEXP))
```
